website_summaries.verdict: Worth a look if an ultra-trim build is your top concern, but it comes with a few quirks that may be deal-breakers.
pros: Very slim structure has contemporary appeal and saves space
Oscillating fan movement delivers nice air output
cons: Surprisingly noisy for such a trim fan

customer_reviews.title: Cold Air............
customer_reviews.text: This was an absolute live saver during the recent heatwave. It actually produces cold air. It is not just recycling the warm air in the room. Very slim and stylish compared to what else is available . Should be easy to store away in the winter. Lots of different programmes. I just stick with the basic one.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkly Star

customer_reviews.title: its ok - its available
customer_reviews.text: power is average, noise levels are average - but it is sleek and can sit in corner all year around. I bought this because I wanted a tower fan for the kitchen, where needs to cool when standing up. I still find i need to tilt it a bit, but, its ok for that task. Also good for the breeze reaching you over furniture. That really is the reason for buying this over other models, aside from the fact that its one of the few models you can actually find in stock - well done british commerce. Oh, and getting it out of the box is absolutely ridiculous - never experienced anything like it.
customer_reviews.author: Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking flimsy plastic of poor design covers a fan that works ok.
customer_reviews.text: Too difficult to get out of packaging - needed 2 people and had to break up packaging so can't send it back. Horrible magnetic balls of polystyrene stuck to everything. Difficult to attach the flimsy plastic base to the tower and tower wobbles precariously now it's done. Tower unnecessarily tall as only puts out air at the top so why the bottom of it. It does do what it's meant to do - fan the air. However, would do the same thing in a better and stronger case. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ms L Hampshire

customer_reviews.title: good looking fan
customer_reviews.text: The fan was brought for my lounge so looked for a fan that also looked good as well as cooling.This fan looks a bit like an upright speaker and blends in very well.The remote control is an added bonus as you can adjust speed and direction from the comfort of your seat.It works well and is not to noisy on the bottom speed.I gave it 4 stars instead of 5stars as the base is a bit light which can make it easy to knock over especially if you have children or pets but other than that it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Tower fan
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this item did not work for me. The stand is unstable. The fan over heated and it's arc of function was poor. I would not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking fan, the remote is very handy, we are using the fan in our bed room, the height where the air come is perfect height for it to skim across the bed. The breeze is gentle, you do have 3 setting. 8 hour timer, you can set the breeze to blow like real wind, soft and strong. It’s quiet, but the oscillating is too much of a degree so you wait too long for the breeze to get you, perfect for a busy room not laying in front of it. The remote does allow you to position the fan whilst laying in your bed making it perfect to position. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s lilac not white
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t try the fan because when I took it out of the box it was lilac. Not white as it stated.
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Such a lovely sleek design. With having a new puppy I was very conscious of having a warm house so was quick to find a fan that suited my house. After looking at different designs and models I loved the style of the Dimplex and was not disappointed when it arrived. Quick assembly with only having to put the base together and works like a dream. Tucks away in the corner with no hanging wires. The wire runs from the base with a clip to run it smoothly through and out the back. Would 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run it for a few nights & try to get it out the box as you MAY need it
customer_reviews.text: Received it ahead of delivery date & was initially happy as it WAS quiet the first night BUT on the second night an hour after turning it on it made a clattering noise like with an old desk fans blade hitting the guard.... Can't send it back as it was so tightly packed in its box.... there was no way of getting it out without tearing the box down the seam. Guess I'll have to see what I can do to sort the problem as doubt they'd take it back without the original box.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: PURPLE fan not white
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I just can’t give a this anything other than a 1. If you advertise as white make sure it’s WHITE not purple! Utterly ridiculous the colour isn’t as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Lawnmower motor in a fan ;)
customer_reviews.text: I already have one of these which I use in my bedroom,not the quietest fan but very effective to help keep cool. I decided to but another one this year for the livingroom when it's especially hot, but the fan sent is faulty, it sounds like it has a lawnmowers motor inside. Trying to return it but I have to pay postage?! Whats that about? Your item is faulty, thats your responsibility not mine! It shouldn't have made it into the box,let alone to a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Curie_us1

customer_reviews.title: I love this fan.
customer_reviews.text: I Don't very often give out 5 star reviews but for this fan I will. This is my second fan only having to replace it after 10 years service from my old one! And trust me it gets used a lot espcially as I have to have a fan on a lot at night. So worth the money. It is a great fan with 3 different fan speeds plus 1 setting that cycles through the different speeds & a night mode. It also has a timer. For me because i go to sleep with a fan most nights the noise does not really effect me but I personally think it is not to load to go to sleep with.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought a second years later
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a Dimplex tall tower fan for years bought from Argos for around £60 but then they stopped selling it and I really wanted another because of how good it was. If this new one is anything like the old one I’ve been using for years then this will be perfect. I’ve noticed the controls have changed slightly but you get the exact same functionality as before.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pink not White
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased 2 of these fans previously and they are great because the cooling air is nice and high. Previous fans were both black, but we thought we would go for a cleaner fresher look and ordered the white. However, they are the strangest colour of white I have ever seen and have a definite pink hue, which is very frustrating. Wondering if anyone else has the same issue?
customer_reviews.author: CMS

customer_reviews.title: These Fans are NOT White
customer_reviews.text: Only three stars as I think these fans have been cocked up in the colouring process and are not white, a shade of lilac or pink maybe, so really should not be sold as white but faulty. Or not sold at all. The fan itself is great, multi speed and the sleep mode is great. No complaints just annoyed there being sold under false pretences
customer_reviews.author: aeslehcevoli

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Fan
customer_reviews.text: This Dimplex Fan was great over the hot weather we thought we would try this style to see if it was any good, It was easy to fit the base and its very powerful. I really like the idea it has a choice of 3 speed settings which you can have it oscillating , and you can put it on a timer for up to 8 hours also it has a handy little remote. It has a powerful fan which the dog seemed to enjoy and unlike some other brands it wasn't that loud and it doesn't take up much room.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Good powerful tall fan, but with a flaw!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these fans, at different times, one for the bedroom and the other for the lounge. I read the reviews on this product and was pleased that it was true to the reviews. Having a high bed and deep mattress in the bedroom this fan is tall enough to circulate air around the middle to upper part of the room rather than at the floor. It also kept our upper body cool whilst sitting in the lounge. The only negative about this fan is that within only weeks of buying them, the oscillating motion stopped working on both of the fans!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very slimline, fits anywhere, air is actually very cold, which is great. Remote is very easy to work out. Easy to put together - one thing though, the instructions as to how to get it out of the package - is in the package!! We opened both ends and pushed it through the box. It's well packaged and in fairness - it has to be.
customer_reviews.author: L.Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Good fan
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews, I agree it is difficult to remove from the box. The box also came damaged but the fan was alright. It keeps the air moving on hot days. The fan is loud and honestly I don’t think the other functions do anything with the noise. Also it has a very bright blue light on the top that annoys my light sensitive husband. I think it is a good fan.
customer_reviews.author: Genuine Buyers Mr&Mrs Mills

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Initially this was excellent but I accidentally knocked it and because it is unstable due to height vs base width and it fell on the floor. Ever since then it has rattled when used. I've checked the base screws and everything is tightened. The rattle keeps me awake so it's not really usable anymore. In summary - very nice to look at but not stable.
customer_reviews.author: PaulM

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible packaging. The box is so narrow, exactly like true to size fit 😂 proper silhouette. Frustrating packaging and small things have made so difficult to put. For example you won’t have tiny screw drivers handy to assemble this so called tall fan. Blades of the fan is normal size like any other fans, they have increased the height by adding more plastic to call it as tower fan and ripping people.
customer_reviews.author: Shab

customer_reviews.title: Wound recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love these fans - best ever. Easy to put together although the packaging is tight to remove. Not that noisy and doesnt stop me from sleeping even though I'm a poor sleeper. Like them so much I have 3 and they are safe for my animals and grandchildren - no blades to catch if knocked over which hasn't happened yet. Never used the timer function hence no stars for this
customer_reviews.author: D S.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly loud but cools well
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised at how loud this fan is. I thought for the brand and price it would be quieter as in had one previously for the fraction of the price and a random brand which wasn’t noisy at all - just a gentle hum. It’s loud but it does cool down a large room promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the noise
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, provides cool air but it's far too loud, even in a normal room and not sleeping. Also, the product is packaged rediculously. It says to just tip out, but the stupid padding prevents this, so ended up damaging most packaging getting it out. I returned it, so then had the fun of trying to get it all back in. Overall a total waste of time and a day off.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: This is the third of these fans I have bought. They are a great height, just right when you're sitting down or lying in bed. It has quite a small footprint so doesn't need much space. It's not too noisy and I often use the timer setting with the one in the bedroom so I can get off to sleep but it doesn't stay on all night. The black looks quite smart too.
customer_reviews.author: SandraL

customer_reviews.title: slimline fan - perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan for my bedroom, its great , its slimline so fits in quite easy anywhere you want it. also not that noisy so perfect for sleeping with and as a timer function which is useful and you can press for a natural breeze which is great. should have bought one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get this - be pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Send as a gift to a relative who is in lockdown in a flat which is very hot. Our relative is 110% delighted and says this fan is absolutely the best thing since BOGOF Chocolate !
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: High Fan
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fan that would stand on the floor and be height enough to reach over my bed, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Coolverine

customer_reviews.title: White was actually pink???
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the white fan for the bedroom (i've had the black one before!) when it arrived though it was a light pink which was very strange and not an attractive pink either. Too late to send back as it's needed in this heat but colour not as stated or pictured on website.
customer_reviews.author: Terence Owen Pitron

customer_reviews.title: Quiet running
customer_reviews.text: I already have one of these. They are quite quiet and easy to use (they have a remote control). A bit tricky to assemble but worth it. I got it to keep the dogs cool as one of them is frightened of a conventional fan. Good price
customer_reviews.author: Jean Howe

customer_reviews.title: Very good fan
customer_reviews.text: The fan Produces strong wind and not very noisy, it also has a good height which is perfect for the bed. The only thing that could be improve is the lights which are strong so not very good for the night, I’ve fixed it by covering the light. I would strongly recommend this fan, very good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vívian

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but
customer_reviews.text: Great stylish product. After a week of constant use it rattles and vibrates so very annoying. After three months stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Mikeh

customer_reviews.title: Good fan, but discoloured unit
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good fan, definitely a life saver during the hottest days! The quietest setting is just about quiet enough for sleep. It got docked a star because my white unit is actually a light lilac colour. Not sure why it's discoloured but it looks a bit odd in my otherwise white room.
customer_reviews.author: C Y Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Fan
customer_reviews.text: A great fan ..nice and cool for the hot summers ..noise levels low nice and slim..on thing I would have liked is that it came in white..but other than that a great buy..
customer_reviews.author: bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Loud and broke after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: The fan itself does a decent job cooling but it rattles while oscillating or when still in certain positions which is VERY annoying. During this ridiculious heatwave it has also stopped working all together, 2 years after purchase. Wouldn't recommend. Get another fan!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan!! Looks smart, sleek and delivers air well. A little noisy but it is a fan.... kept us very cool during the hot summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. We have survived this years heatwaves because of this machine. Looks sleek and modern in our living room. Strong air comes out even on the first settings. It has timer and oscillating settings. Easy to use, even my 4 year old knows how to switch it on and make it turn. Would recommend for anyone looking for a really good quality tower fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is lilac the new white?
customer_reviews.text: Whoever thinks this is white is clearly colour blind. Is the black one orange I wonder? Colour aside it is easy to assemble, hardest part was extracting it from the box. Unit works well. Being used in kitchen so the height is ideal
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

customer_reviews.title: The 'white' is definitely pink!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed some reviewers ordered this in white, but didn't mention the pink/ lilac tinge - if you wanted white, this is not it. It's OK, but not as good as the black version - I don't know why as they are described as the same! We got the black one and it is fantastic, this one doesn't seem as 'cooling' but it does the job for a small room that gets hot. It's also quiet, compared to the circular fans which is good. Amazon - the listing needs to be changed, it's def not white
customer_reviews.author: Shen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great cooling fan, good quality & looks great, all the features add to its effectiveness & usefulness in the hot weather. Would recommend. Easy to assemble the base which is sturdy for the height of the tower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both Original and Replacement faulty
customer_reviews.text: The item when initially purchased was very good. however, within a month, it started rattling to the point of being unusable. - Amazon sent a replacement, which also started rattling to the point where it was unusable - Would NOT recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Explair
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with my purchase. Quiet, effective and good to look at.
customer_reviews.author: PAM

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for 40W
customer_reviews.text: It’s powerful, but relatively loud on high speed for light sleepers. The delivery time was long, but it looks smooth and keeps the room cool. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: rickkelsey

customer_reviews.title: Good Quiet Fan
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the fan. It was quiet and moved the air about enough to keep us cool. Yes it is tight in the packaging but as long as you are careful it comes out of the box without ripping it apart. It was stable on our carpet and there was no noise when it was on rotate and was vert quite at night time. Remote control is useful.
customer_reviews.author: alfie35

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: It rubbish i had it a year but I Only used it for a few months in the summer and now the motor broke I was very annoyed as it cost me a Lot of money thanks for this wish I never bought it thought I’d get more use out of it doesn’t last long at all
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice and slim so easy to move around if needed. It’s also reasonably quiet and the remote control is perfect for night time use
customer_reviews.author: Gill

customer_reviews.title: Great fan. Terrible remote
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. Remote control broke. Can’t find replacement. Otherwise excellent but as my mum is bed ridden a remote is a must. Please get in touch to get a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: Sleek look but hardly effective. Poor reach and very less air coverage.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Smart and compact design with good power and a sleep timer too
customer_reviews.text: Great sleek full size fan at a sensible price. I love the timer function, especially during this heatwave you can fall asleep knowing it will switch off.
customer_reviews.author: Louby

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these fans in june and all four are not working. its strange thay have all stopped working about the same time i have registered the fans with Dimplex but still trying to get through I cant find anything on amazon to help me send these back either replacement or refund sorry I bought these
customer_reviews.author: vivien kyle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wait for the heat wave’ get yourself a wish of cool fresh air 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Excellent reliable and neat design 👍🏼 Helps relieve my swollen feet/ankles as i suffer from raynard’s and the time rant air flow cools and aids speedily 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: shai66

customer_reviews.title: Hard work
customer_reviews.text: When they packed this, they clearly didn’t want anyone to get this item out. The hardest thing to unpack and assemble that I have ever encountered. And I’m an IKEA veteran! Once out, and assembled, the fan works well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Gale

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad fan but I’ve had better! It’s not that quiet if you want to use it throughout the night and also the illuminated control panel is quite bright if you like a pitch black room.
customer_reviews.author: SueB21a

customer_reviews.title: The best fan ever
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect-the correct height and evenly distributes cool air around my front room. It’s not noisy and it’s sleek. The best bit is that I can use the remote to change the settings so no more getting up and down to switch it up or down
customer_reviews.author: Florencemummy

customer_reviews.title: Noisy. Sometimes. Enough to be annoying
customer_reviews.text: The casing has a tendancy to start vibrating and making a brrr noise after a few minutes. So it's annoying to have on at night. It's just a cheaply built fan.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. White

customer_reviews.title: Worth money
customer_reviews.text: Works well Remote easy and works well Keeps room cool Noise level not too bad Good buy Better fan than a round type
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Parmenter

customer_reviews.title: Great fan low noise
customer_reviews.text: Great fan very low noise too . Does blow quite some distance too. A great buy as got this on an amazon deal of the day
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is reasonably quiet
customer_reviews.text: Works well and has decent functions and is quiet enough. So fan is fine for what it is, but does not feel as well made and sturdy as others on the market. Seems a bit wobbly after fitting to the base
customer_reviews.author: Camp Freddie

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Nice slim fan work's well . Little bit noise but its a fan. The blue light is a bit bright but didn't bother me. All in all for the money good value.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mattock

customer_reviews.title: The fan broke after 6 months and would no longer ...
customer_reviews.text: The fan broke after 6 months and would no longer blow air so I had to return the product. As others have mentioned there are blue lights on the top of the fan when turned on which are actually quite bright in a dark room, and it was quite noisy when oscillating as you could hear the plastic base rattling. When it comes to this product, I'm just not a fan...
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: Slim and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Happy enough with this. Not overly noisy. Don’t like the ‘random breeze’ setting. Definitely worth the purchase if you considering a Dyson. This is slim and stands in the corner of my bedroom. Hardly notice it. The remote is great. My only gripe is the LEDs at night. This was overcome by putting a hat on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Berber

customer_reviews.title: Value for money quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality tower fan for the money. Runs very quietly, and can cool a regular sized uk south facing lounge in the hot weather we have been getting this year. Remote stores itself in a recess at the rear of the fan
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these. Both of them feel extremely cheap and considering the price it's really bad. The second fan rattles so much I've given up on it. First one is still working fine. If you're going to spend this much on it but a bionaire instead
customer_reviews.author: Mr Y.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price tag....
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. Ok for cooler seasons but not for hot summer days. Not cooling at all. Not worth the high price tag.
customer_reviews.author: SEZEA KHATUN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly effective and quiet too very useful as it moves air around over a far more vertical area than most cooling fans
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T. Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight fan with multiple settings!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, lightweight and does the job, which is to cool down the room during these warm nights!
customer_reviews.author: Smriti Jha

customer_reviews.title: Broken within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 months - really disappointed as it seemed to work really great but stopped after less than two months. Would not expect this especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: M.A

customer_reviews.title: Avoid Buying if possible
customer_reviews.text: The screws supplied never fitted into the actual base of the fan and kept falling out no matter how much I screwed them in. As a result fan is tilted and appears to be on the brink of falling apart. Very cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shreya

customer_reviews.title: Falls over every time I use it
customer_reviews.text: The fan does not fasten securely to the base and so when I turn it to its highest setting it falls over. I also can’t pick it up to move it without it dismantling into three pieces. I have contacted the manufacturer to ask if I didn’t receive a vital fastening but the experience so far has been one of complete frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected
customer_reviews.text: We bought this fan based on previous reviews however, we are a little disappointed that it's illuminating blue power light literally lights up the room at night. We feel this needs to be addressed as it is difficult to sleep and we have to cover the top of it which is not the best solution. Other than that it's quite a good tower fan but a bit on the pricey side.
customer_reviews.author: John Hitchiner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: A great fan. Taller than I was expecting but it is very efficient , a great powerful fan and we have really appreciated it in the hot weather
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: stands anywhere in youre room . Looks good and definitely keeps you cool .
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy and cheaply made for price
customer_reviews.text: Why on earth was this machine rated so highly? It was so flimsy it felt like it could fall over at any moment. With a baby and dog, we couldn’t take that risk and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a month before breaking down
customer_reviews.text: This was great while it lasted, but packed it in all of a sudden after a month. Very disappointed, as it is not a cheap item.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Fan broke just after one year
customer_reviews.text: After one year the fan decided to break, there is now an audible noise from the unit and it does not turn or hardly blow any air. I would give this product a 1 star if it wasn't for that fact that it's a decent tower model with some push to it and a fair price. However, for durability? It's absolute pants.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Green

customer_reviews.title: Less is more’ cools a whole room rapidly 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend after her liking mine’ fantastic x
customer_reviews.author: shai66

customer_reviews.title: It’s not white it’s lilac!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a white one but as you can see, it’s lilac! Not a problem as it fits in well In the room but not what I was expecting. The quality of the base is quite poor, very difficult to fit together. However, it’s very effective in use, quite quiet and discreet.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with early delivery, it looks nice and it does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila W.

customer_reviews.title: Did not perform
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back as the base would not hold together. Also expensive for a plastic fan
customer_reviews.author: Miss S. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Great fan hard but to put together oneself
customer_reviews.text: Struggled to get it out of packing and had to cut box not ideal if needed to return it. Putting it together really needs two pairs of hands. I really struggled on my own. Would have liked the timer function less than an hour which is the minimum. Fan plenty powerful and not too noisy. Oscillation seems to work but not very wide.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Baelz

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved my fan, and it's not as powerful as I thought it would be, and it's quite noisy when it's oscillating, but i need it so I will be keeping but I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B. G. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Awesome,  fantastic at night
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product , I love it , don't know how I lived without it
customer_reviews.author: chunner10

customer_reviews.title: Good value and very effective.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a Godsend in the recent heatwave. Much cheaper than many others,but equally effective. A really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn johnston

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: These fans are excellent Have now ordered four The last one for my 90 year old mother as the remote is perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Jean Dalzell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: A bit noise, but does the job properly. It doesn't decrease temperature, but gives you nice breeze and makes you feel better in the hot weather. Noisy as f.. still cannot sleep with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandr

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well and did its bit during the recent spell of hot weather with no problem. Noted the problem others had with the packaging! Recommend opening the package down its long side rather than at one end. Makes life a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Peter T.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not quiet
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the bedroom during the recent heat wave, it is a good unit, but not quiet enough to sleep with, does cool down a room though and gives a nice flow of air
customer_reviews.author: cath

customer_reviews.title: Tall fan!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the foot of the bed because it’s so tall
customer_reviews.author: Gaz

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: It works very well as s fan but was very disappointed with the colour The white has a strong lilac tone which was not wished for
customer_reviews.author: Joss King

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality  High Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like the sleek design, during the hot weather is really good having this fan. Is much better than my previous fan i have. It doesn't have any noise when the fan was on. 100% Recommend
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant even tho expensive
customer_reviews.text: Bit expensive for a fan. But brilliant in the bedroom as the cold air starts above the bed and not underneath it
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Turner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these in the past and it's still going strong from 7 years ago. Bought another one for our daughters bedroom and its spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Terence C.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't live without it. Thought it is a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't live without it. Thought it is a little bit noisy it it just the thing for a menopausal woman.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S. T. Price

customer_reviews.title: PURPLE - Stay away if you want white!
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned this is PURPLE. You have to destroy the packaging to get it out and look at it properly. Thought I could live with it but I’ve decided I can not. It is an eyesore in room with white walls.
customer_reviews.author: Will McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Used this all summer long, some people moan about the noise but it’s that of a normal desk fan type noise I had absolutely no issues sleeping with it running in my bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool off !!
customer_reviews.text: During the heatwave it was indeed a godsend ! when not in use we just move to the corner of the room as part of the furniture. No problems so far, does exactly as it says on the tin ! as the saying goes. Good buy, product and smart looking. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pusscat

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and not effective
customer_reviews.text: Too loud, too bright display, makes a buzzing sound, not powerful enough cooling unless at max setting which comes with increased noise. And looks like we have to cover the return costs!
customer_reviews.author: Kornelia

customer_reviews.title: Good fan for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall and certainly fits the job we was after it cools the room (or at least makes it more bearable) and looks quite smart, we was after a dyson fan but decided the extra cost wasn't worth it in the end, and happy we got this. If I had one complaint it might be that it's a tad loud but once you get used to it this isn't really a issue.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Bright lights
customer_reviews.text: Good fan, I like the height so that it reaches you if you’re on the sofa or in bed. I wish there was a timer option for only 30 minutes as an hour is a bit too long sometimes. Noise isn’t too much of an issue if you’re trying to sleep but the lights are very bright!!
customer_reviews.author: C B

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fan, it is quite loud if you have it on the highest setting but if I’m honest I only ever have it on 1 or 2 as it’s very powerful! Also like the fact I can set a time on it and the little remote is handy.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte brown

product_meta.title: Dimplex Mont Blanc Cooling Fan
product_meta.description:
Color:Mont Blanc Cooling Fan - BlackThe Dimplex Mont Blanc tower fan is a stylish way to keep cool at home or in the office. The tall, slim frame with black finish has been designed with both practicality and style in mind. Three speed settings can be selected from the LED display or by using the remote control. The small base of the fan means that it can easily be stored in the corner of a room. whilst the handle allows you to move it easily between rooms. Cooling fan. 40W power consumption. 3 fan speed settings. 8 hour timer. Electronic LED control display. Oscillating function. Carry handle. Remote control (including batteries). Safety cut-out. 1.8m power cord length. Super slim 'pen-like' design. Dimensions: H 121.5 x W 31 x D 31cm. Weight: 2.93kg. Model: DXMBCF.

Programmable Timer: Yes.
Number of Speeds: 3.
Electric: Yes.
Brand: Glen Dimplex.
Type: Cooling Fan.
Remote Control: Yes.
Pedestal: No.
Bladeless: Yes.
Oscillates: Yes.
Wattage: 40W.
Fan Diameter: N/A.
Number of Blades: N/A.

SET CONTAINS:


1 x Mont Blanc cooling fan
feature_bullets: Choice of three fan speed settings
